com.cmt3319.game
Class LoadingScreen

java.lang.Object
  com.cmt3319.interfaces.Screen
      com.cmt3319.game.LoadingScreen

public class LoadingScreen
extends com.cmt3319.interfaces.Screen

First screen loaded when game is run, loads all assets associated with project. Does not present anything to user but sets MainMenuScreen as the current screen when it has finished loading. Interfaces with the setter methods in Assets and extends Screen.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Robert Wells
